alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 09 at 10:09PM AKST until February 12 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM FRIDAY TO 3 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Haines and Skagway including the South Klondike and the Haines Highways. * WHEN...From 3 AM Friday to 3 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Snow will be wet and heavy in weight and will be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to cool below freezing Thursday night ahead of the next system that arrives late Thursday night into Friday. Snow is expected to change to rain near sea level late Friday night with the borders remaining snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
